title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: The checkboxes in the Export Zip feature should display a busy cursor while they are being updated. Currently, this behavior is not being exhibited.
OB: When using the Export Zip feature, the checkboxes do not show a busy cursor while they are being updated.
EB: When using the Export Zip feature, the checkboxes should display a busy cursor while they are being updated.
SR: To reproduce this issue: 1. Open a workspace with many projects. 2. Go to the Export Zip option. 3. Select all projects. 4. Choose some file types. 5. Press okay.
